headline: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) Unveils New Cybersecurity Service For Operational Technology Protection
summary: Last week, Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) announced the launch of its Security Monitoring and Response service, aimed at bolstering industrial cybersecurity amid increasing OT environment complexities. The company’s stock rose 9% over the week, a performance that aligns with broader market trends where the overall market saw a similar upward move of 7%. In contrast, major tech stocks such as Nvidia and Tesla experienced declines. Rockwell’s recent announcement, addressing key industry...

headline: Rockwell Automation Unveils Powerful New Service to Detect and Respond to OT Cyber Threats
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced its Security Monitoring and Response service, which is purpose-built to deliver continuous, real-time monitoring of operational technology (OT) environments. Security Monitoring and Response seamlessly integrates into existing architecture to help industrial organizations stay ahead of cyber threats and build resilient operations.
